sellOnFlipkart.content:
Flipkart Seller Hub offers the perfect opportunity for businesses to conduct a significant part of their operations online. Unlike conventional marketing, sellers can now showcase their products outside of their area of operations and reach a wider audience. With our services, you can gain access to several features to conduct your business efficiently. So, if you are looking to sell online, you have come to the right place.


How to Sell Online at Flipkart Seller Hub?

In order to sell online in a convenient and effective way, we have provided a plethora of features for you. Our online selling platform facilitates quick payments and dynamic cataloguing. Along with these features, you can also apply some of our effective methods to grow your business.Let us discuss how to sell products online via Flipkart Seller Hub.

When you are looking to sell products online, make sure to define each of them with the appropriate details to appeal to your customers. Moreover, if you have a diverse range of products, do not be hesitant to bring them online. The more variety you provide, the more options the buyer has. And finally, as an online seller, you must ensure premium quality in each and every product to create a positive experience for the buyers.

Our seamless registration process will take up only ten minutes of your time. All you need to do is fill in a few important details and you are good to go. So, sign up now and commence your e-commerce journey with Flipkart Seller Hub!

description.title: WHAT IS SHOPSY?

With Shopsy, sellers can cater to this category of consumers with Resellers who the consumers trust and generate profit through a trust-based selling platform. Resellers form an interim layer between seller and customers.

Shopsy creates a layer of distribution between e-commerce sellers and consumers through Resellers. By leveraging a platform to create an earning, Shopsy permits sellers to target the right audience who would look out for affordable products.

orderItemValue.text: Selling price & Shipping charge paid by customer and excludes discount offered by Seller

marketplaceFee.text: Includes shipping fee, fixed fee and selling commission

shippingFees.title: SHIPPING FEES
shippingFees.introText: To ensure ease of selling and the best possible customer experience, we mandate delivery to all customers via our logistics partners and deduct the shipping cost from the selling price before making a payment to you. Shipping fee is calculated on actual weight or volumetric weight, whichever is higher. This is to account for items which are lightweight but occupy a lot of shipping space.
shippingFees.equation: Volumetric Weight (kg) = Length (cm) X Breadth (cm) X Height (cm)/5000

orderedList.statement: Shipping rate for forward shipments is applicable for Bronze Sellers only.
There is 20% and 10% discount on the forward shipping fee for Gold and Silver Sellers respectively.
Mentioned rates are exclusive of all taxes.

unorderedList.statement: Local (Intracity): Item shipped within a city.
Zonal (Intrazone): Item shipped within the borders of a zone (North, South, East, West).

fixedFees.title: FIXED FEES
fixedFees.introText: Fixed Fee is a small amount charged for every successful sale transaction. A successful sale transaction is an order which has been successfully delivered to the customer. In case of any customer return, this fee is charged. However, no fee is charged in case of a courier return. Also, this fee varies based on the order item value irrespective of the category and seller tier.

collectionFees.title: COLLECTION FEES
collectionFees.introText: A small payment collection fee is charged to you for all prepaid and postpaid orders that you receive. The Collection fee will vary depending on the payment type chosen by the customer (Prepaid/Postpaid) . For a prepaid order - Based on Payment gateway, For a postpaid order - Based on cash collection charges. The collection fee will be calculated on the final selling price of a product. The final selling price is a sum of the amount paid by the Customer including shipping charges, if any (Price of product + Shipping charges). This will remain the same for all sellers irrespective of the category and tier.

fulfilment.title: Seller Fulfilment
fulfilment.text: Under seller fulfillment, you are responsible for processing and managing your orders and inventory. Once you have packed your orders and marked RTD, an E-kart agent will collect this package and deliver it to the respective customer

fulfilment.title: Smart Fulfilment
fulfilment.text: Smart Fulfillment is a program wherein you get help from Flipkart for systematically arranging your warehouse, easily maintaining your inventory and getting it smoothly delivered to your customer via a Flipkart logistics partner. All you have to do is comply with the smart construct norms to reap the benefits. This construct helps you in boosting the sales, ROI and reducing the overall cost of doing business.

fulfilment.title: Flipkart Fulfilment
fulfilment.text: At Flipkart, we help you have maximum returns with minimum investment. That’s why the Flipkart Fulfilment service offers you the use of our state-of-the-art fulfillment centers at very low costs. You store your products in our fulfillment centers where we take utmost care of your inventory.

content.caption: Why should I sell on Flipkart?
content.data: Flipkart is one of the most trusted and best E-commerce platforms. With over 50 crore customers across 27000+ pin codes, Flipkart is trusted by more than 500000 sellers online throughout India. By selling online on Flipkart, the sellers also get access to some of India’s largest shopping festivals, such as The Big Billion Days, The Big Diwali Sale, and whatnot! Flipkart.com provides a very low cost of doing business.

content.caption: How does selling on Flipkart.com work?
content.data: Selling on Flipkart is a very easy process. All you have to do is list the products that you wish to sell on Flipkart.com. Once the order is placed, all that is required from your end is that you pack your product and deliver the product or use Fulfillment by Flipkart (FBF) and let Flipkart deliver the product for you. Once the product is dispatched, you will receive your payment within 7-10 days* from the date of dispatch.

content.caption: What is the minimum listing quantity to sell on Flipkart.com?
content.data: To sell online on Flipkart.com, all you require is at least 1 product to be listed. However, we recommend you to go for more than 1 product as Flipkart encompasses over 50 crore customers across 27000+ pin codes and the trust of 500000 sellers.

content.caption: What products can I sell on Flipkart.com?
content.data: Flipkart.com has more than 3000+ categories that you can opt from and sell online across 27000+ pin codes of India. Some of the popular categories are Clothes, Sarees, Electronics, Shoes, Jewelry, T-Shirts, Furniture, Art, Books, Watch, Mobiles, Camera, Bed, Groceries, Beauty Products, Plants, Kitchenware, and many more. However, certain categories require prior quality approval from the internal committee before going live.

content.caption: What do I need to register to sell on Flipkart.com?
content.data:
For selling product online on Flipkart.com, you require the following details-
  1. Details about your business
  2. Contact details (email id and phone number)
  3. Details about your tax registration- GSTIN (compulsory if your listed products are taxable) and PAN (Mandatory for Book Sellers)

content.caption: I don’t have a website; can I still sell on Flipkart.com?
content.data: A big yes. For selling your products on Flipkart.com, you don't require a website. You will have access to Flipkart Seller Hub after completing your registration where you can list your products and start selling. However, Flipkart.com charges a small amount of marketplace fee once your product is sold out.

content.caption: What is FAssured?
content.data: FAssured by Flipkart is a special reliability program where Flipkart will provide additional visibility to your products. It will also ensure that the product goes under additional quality checks and gets delivered within 2-4 days of ordering. A FAssured tag guarantees more orders, faster delivery, increased visibility, and higher quality. In short, it is Flipkart’s seal of trust, quality, and speed. By getting a FAssured badge, you can get better revenue and earn trust from customers.

content.caption: Can I offer both products and services on Flipkart.com?
content.data: Currently, Flipkart only allows sellers to sell their products online. However, as a third-party service provider, you can offer specific services to the Flipkart sellers to help grow their business, to know more, click here.

content.caption: Who decides the price of my products?
content.data: The seller solely decides the price of any product listed on Flipkart.com. However, we provide an easy pricing calculator to determine the most accurate price for your product.

content.caption: What are the charges for selling on Flipkart.com?
content.data: Flipkart.com doesn't charge anything for listing the products. However, upon a successful sale, the seller has to incur a small amount of charge as a marketplace fee.

content.caption: Will I get charged for listing products on Flipkart.com?
content.data: Absolutely not. Flipkart.com doesn’t charge anything for listing the products on its platform.

content.caption: How and when do I get paid?
content.data:
The seller receives the payout depending on the Seller's Tier-
  1. Wood- 15 business days from the date of dispatch
  2. Bronze & Silver- 10 business days from the date of dispatch
  3. Gold & Platinum- 7 business days from the date of dispatch

content.caption: How do I list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.data: Once you have the brand approval of your products from Flipkart’s Brand Regulation Team, you can then proceed to choose the most suitable category for your product. Based on the category you choose, you'll be asked to include product details such as size, model, color, brand, etc. To boost your sales and enhance your online selling experience, you can also take advantage of our various programs by Flipkart, for as low as ₹999 for 1 month. In case of any assistance or guidance, you can reach out to Flipkart’s Seller Support Team 24/7.

content.caption: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?
content.data:
Our seller dashboard makes it very easy for you to manage your orders. There are three ways through which you can manage your orders-
  1. Once the order is placed, we will notify you regarding the confirmation of your order. You can then pack your product either with Flipkart’s packaging or any other brand packaging and mark it as ‘ready to dispatch’ within the given timeline. Our logistics partner will pick up the order and deliver it to the customer
  2. Under the Dropship model, the seller shall be solely responsible for packaging, delivery, installation (wherever applicable), re-packaging, uninstallation and reverse logistics of products either directly by the seller or through a third party appointed by the seller
  3. If you are using FBF (Fulfillment by Flipkart), your orders will be packed and shipped by Flipkart. If you wish to deliver your products on your own, you are required to pack and ship the products and confirm the same to the customer through your Flipkart Seller Account

content.caption: What do I need to list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.data: To list products on Flipkart.com, you need product details, price, images, stock, and shipping information.

content.caption: Can I get help with the development of the catalog (product images, description, etc.)?
content.data: Yes, Flipkart.com always takes good care of its sellers. To amplify your selling experience, Flipkart provides a huge Partner Services Network. One of them is our recently launched IGNITE program, which is as low as ₹999 for 1 month that provides image editing and product cataloging services to enhance product images and kickstart your business. Click here to know more.

content.caption: Do you offer protection against fraud?
content.data: Yes, Flipkart.com provides monetary compensation against the orders where the returned products have been damaged/ missing under 'Seller Protection Fund (SPF)' program.

content.caption: Can customers leave feedback and why is customer feedback important?
content.data: Yes, customers can leave feedback regarding the purchased product. Customer feedback and rating are important factors for becoming a successful online seller on Flipkart.com. The higher the rating, the higher the trust in the seller. It is also noticed that customers tend to buy products from sellers with high ratings and positive feedback. In short, feedback plays an evaluating factor in determining the performance of the seller.

content.caption: I am having trouble during registration. Can I get some help?
content.data: Once you are registered at Flipkart Seller Hub, you can get in touch with the seller support team at sell@flipkart.com. Our seller support executive will assist you in the registration process. You can also refer to the FAQ section for any doubts/queries. We will be happy to assist you in each step.

content.caption: Do I need GST to sell on Flipkart?
content.data:
Sellers can sell products online under 2 categories - ‘Everything + Books’ or ‘Only Books’.
  1. For the option ‘Everything + Books’, GSTIN is mandatory
  2. For the option 'Only Books', PAN is mandatory

content.caption: What is Fulfillment by Flipkart (FBF)?
content.data: Fulfillment By Flipkart is an exclusive program run by Flipkart.com.  Under FBF, your products will be stored at Flipkart’s warehouse from where we will pack and deliver your products to the customers upon order confirmation. Apart from this, FBF will also provide customer service and handle returns.

content.caption: How does FBF work?
content.data:
1. Once you are nominated by Flipkart, you are required to register on Flipkart’s warehouses or Fulfillment Centers as an additional place of your business with the tax authorities
  2. Next, you are required to send your products to the Flipkart warehouse through Flipkart consignment in advance which is required to be fulfilled by packing and labeling them and shipping your package to us
  3. Upon receiving, we will store your products in Flipkart’s Fulfillment Centers.
  4. Once the order is received and confirmed, we will ship your products directly from Flipkart’s Fulfillment Centers to the customers
  5. In case of any returns, Flipkart.com will take care of it and in case of any damage or wrong products received in return, Flipkart will settle auto SPF against these orders

content.caption: What are the benefits of FBF?
content.data:
By procuring your products/orders through Flipkart’s Fulfillment Centers, you are entitled to the following benefits-
  1. Quality Assurance- You can now delight your customers with Flipkart’s trusted quality and assurance
  2. Technologically Advancement - Take advantage of Flipkart’s Fulfillment technology to enhance your business
  3. No New Investment- Get rid of your worries about renting/buying a new property for storing your products and taking care of them. Flipkart will do it for you
  4. No Seller Service Metrics impact: There will not be any RTD Breaches, Pickup Reattempt, and Seller cancellations as the procurement will be managed by the Flipkart Fulfillment center
  5. Higher procurement speed: Products will be delivered to the customers at a higher rate as the packing will be managed by the Fulfillment center and will be delivered to the customers. There is no requirement for you to wait for the order to move to the pending label tab, generate the label and mark RTD, handover the shipment as per the scheduled date)

content.caption: Do I need a minimum number of items to avail of FBF?
content.data: No, there is no need to have a minimum number of items to avail FBF. You can avail FBF with one item to the ‘n’ number of items from any category.

content.faqQuestions: What is FAssured?

By getting a FAssured badge, you can get better revenue and earn trust from customers.

content.faqQuestions: How do I list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Once you have the brand approval of your products from Flipkart’s Brand Regulation Team, you can then proceed to choose the most suitable category for your product. Based on the category you choose, you'll be asked to include product details such as size, model, color, brand, etc. To boost your sales and enhance your online selling experience, you can also take advantage of our various programs by Flipkart, for as low as ₹999 for 1 month. content.faqQuestions: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription:
Our seller dashboard makes it very easy for you to manage your orders. There are three ways through which you can manage your orders-
  1. Once the order is placed, we will notify you regarding the confirmation of your order. You can then pack your product either with Flipkart’s packaging or any other brand packaging and mark it as ‘ready to dispatch’ within the given timeline. Our logistics partner will pick up the order and deliver it to the customer
  2. Under the Dropship model, the seller shall be solely responsible for packaging, delivery, installation (wherever applicable), re-packaging, uninstallation and reverse logistics of products either directly by the seller or through a third party appointed by the seller
  3. If you are using FBF (Fulfillment by Flipkart), your orders will be packed and shipped by Flipkart. If you wish to deliver your products on your own, you are required to pack and ship the products and confirm the same to the customer through your Flipkart Seller Account

content.faqQuestions: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?

  2. Under the Dropship model, the seller shall be solely responsible for packaging, delivery, installation (wherever applicable), re-packaging, uninstallation and reverse logistics of products either directly by the seller or through a third party appointed by the seller

content.faqQuestions: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?

content.faqQuestions: What do I need to register to sell on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription:
For selling product online on Flipkart.com, you require the following details-
  1. Details about your business
  2. Contact details (email id and phone number)
  3. Details about your tax registration- GSTIN (compulsory if your listed products are taxable) and PAN (Mandatory for Book Sellers)

content.faqQuestions: I don’t have a website; can I still sell on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: A big yes. For selling your products on Flipkart.com, you don't require a website. You will have access to Flipkart Seller Hub after completing your registration where you can list your products and start selling. However, Flipkart.com charges a small amount of marketplace fee once your product is sold out.

content.faqQuestions: What is FAssured?
content.faqDescription: FAssured by Flipkart is a special reliability program where Flipkart will provide additional visibility to your products. It will also ensure that the product goes under additional quality checks and gets delivered within 2-4 days of ordering. A FAssured tag guarantees more orders, faster delivery, increased visibility, and higher quality. In short, it is Flipkart’s seal of trust, quality, and speed. By getting a FAssured badge, you can get better revenue and earn trust from customers.

content.faqQuestions: Can I offer both products and services on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Currently, Flipkart only allows sellers to sell their products online. However, as a third-party service provider, you can offer specific services to the Flipkart sellers to help grow their business, to know more, click here.

content.faqQuestions: Who decides the price of my products?
content.faqDescription: The seller solely decides the price of any product listed on Flipkart.com. However, we provide an easy pricing calculator to determine the most accurate price for your product.

content.faqQuestions: What are the charges for selling on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Flipkart.com doesn't charge anything for listing the products. However, upon a successful sale, the seller has to incur a small amount of charge as a marketplace fee.

content.faqQuestions: Will I get charged for listing products on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Absolutely not. Flipkart.com doesn’t charge anything for listing the products on its platform.

content.faqQuestions: How and when do I get paid?
content.faqDescription:
The seller receives the payout depending on the Seller's Tier-
  1. Wood- 15 business days from the date of dispatch
  2. Bronze & Silver- 10 business days from the date of dispatch
  3. Gold & Platinum- 7 business days from the date of dispatch

content.faqQuestions: How do I list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Once you have the brand approval of your products from Flipkart’s Brand Regulation Team, you can then proceed to choose the most suitable category for your product. Based on the category you choose, you'll be asked to include product details such as size, model, color, brand, etc. To boost your sales and enhance your online selling experience, you can also take advantage of our various programs by Flipkart, for as low as ₹999 for 1 month. In case of any assistance or guidance, you can reach out to Flipkart’s Seller Support Team 24/7.

content.faqQuestions: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription:
Our seller dashboard makes it very easy for you to manage your orders. There are three ways through which you can manage your orders-
  1. Once the order is placed, we will notify you regarding the confirmation of your order. You can then pack your product either with Flipkart’s packaging or any other brand packaging and mark it as ‘ready to dispatch’ within the given timeline. Our logistics partner will pick up the order and deliver it to the customer
  2. Under the Dropship model, the seller shall be solely responsible for packaging, delivery, installation (wherever applicable), re-packaging, uninstallation and reverse logistics of products either directly by the seller or through a third party appointed by the seller
  3. If you are using FBF (Fulfillment by Flipkart), your orders will be packed and shipped by Flipkart. If you wish to deliver your products on your own, you are required to pack and ship the products and confirm the same to the customer through your Flipkart Seller Account

content.faqQuestions: What do I need to list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: To list products on Flipkart.com, you need product details, price, images, stock, and shipping information.

content.faqQuestions: Can I get help with the development of the catalog (product images, description, etc.)?
content.faqDescription: Yes, Flipkart.com always takes good care of its sellers. To amplify your selling experience, Flipkart provides a huge Partner Services Network. One of them is our recently launched IGNITE program, which is as low as ₹999 for 1 month that provides image editing and product cataloging services to enhance product images and kickstart your business. Click here to know more.

content.faqQuestions: How do I list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Once you have the brand approval of your products from Flipkart’s Brand Regulation Team, you can then proceed to choose the most suitable category for your product. Based on the category you choose, you'll be asked to include product details such as size, model, color, brand, etc. To boost your sales and enhance your online selling experience, you can also take advantage of our various programs by Flipkart, for as low as ₹999 for 1 month. content.faqQuestions: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription:
Our seller dashboard makes it very easy for you to manage your orders. There are three ways through which you can manage your orders-
  1. Once the order is placed, we will notify you regarding the confirmation of your order. You can then pack your product either with Flipkart’s packaging or any other brand packaging and mark it as ‘ready to dispatch’ within the given timeline. Our logistics partner will pick up the order and deliver it to the customer
  2. Under the Dropship model, the seller shall be solely responsible for packaging, delivery, installation (wherever applicable), re-packaging, uninstallation and reverse logistics of products either directly by the seller or through a third party appointed by the seller
  3. If you are using FBF (Fulfillment by Flipkart), your orders will be packed and shipped by Flipkart. If you wish to deliver your products on your own, you are required to pack and ship the products and confirm the same to the customer through your Flipkart Seller Account

You will have access to Flipkart Seller Hub after completing your registration where you can list your products and start selling. However, Flipkart.com charges a small amount of marketplace fee once your product is sold out.

content.faqQuestions: What is FAssured?
content.faqDescription: FAssured by Flipkart is a special reliability program where Flipkart will provide additional visibility to your products. It will also ensure that the product goes under additional quality checks and gets delivered within 2-4 days of ordering. A FAssured tag guarantees more orders, faster delivery, increased visibility, and higher quality. In short, it is Flipkart’s seal of trust, quality, and speed. By getting a FAssured badge, you can get better revenue and earn trust from customers.

The seller receives the payout depending on the Seller's Tier-

  2. Bronze & Silver- 10 business days from the date of dispatch
  3. Gold & Platinum- 7 business days from the date of dispatch

content.faqQuestions: How do I list my products on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Once you have the brand approval of your products from Flipkart’s Brand Regulation Team, you can then proceed to choose the most suitable category for your product. Based on the category you choose, you'll be asked to include product details such as size, model, color, brand, etc. To boost your sales and enhance your online selling experience, you can also take advantage of our various programs by Flipkart, for as low as ₹999 for 1 month. In case of any assistance or guidance, you can reach out to Flipkart’s Seller Support Team 24/7.

content.faqQuestions: How do I manage my orders on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription:
Our seller dashboard makes it very easy for you to manage your orders. There are three ways through which you can manage your orders-
  1. Once the order is placed, we will notify you regarding the confirmation of your order. You can then pack your product either with Flipkart’s packaging or any other brand packaging and mark it as ‘ready to dispatch’ within the given timeline. Our logistics partner will pick up the order and deliver it to the customer
  2. Under the Dropship model, the seller shall be solely responsible for packaging, delivery, installation (wherever applicable), re-packaging, uninstallation and reverse logistics of products either directly by the seller or through a third party appointed by the seller
  3. If you are using FBF (Fulfillment by Flipkart), your orders will be packed and shipped by Flipkart. If you wish to deliver your products on your own, you are required to pack and ship the products and confirm the same to the customer through your Flipkart Seller Account

content.faqDescription: To list products on Flipkart.com, you need product details, price, images, stock, and shipping information.

threeThingsModule.heading: You Need to Keep in
threeThingsModule.heading2: Mind While Selling Indian Clothes Online

content.threeThingsDescription: The photos of your products are the first thing that potential customers will see, so it is important to make sure that they are attractive and showcase the details of the clothes. Use high-resolution images and consider showing the clothes from multiple angles.

Besides images, a proper description of products, including the type of fabric, size, embellishments, embroideries, and any special features should be provided. This will help customers make informed purchasing decisions.

Indian clothes are often made from delicate fabrics and may require special care. Hence, it is important to provide care instructions to customers so they can maintain the quality of the item. Washing, drying, and ironing instructions are some of the points you should not miss out on.
To ensure customer satisfaction, clearly mention the return policy consisting of a reasonable timeframe for returns, the condition of the product, refund/exchange, etc.

content.faqQuestions: Why should I sell on Flipkart?
content.faqDescription: Flipkart is one of the most trusted and best E-commerce platforms. With over 50 crore customers across 27000+ pin codes, Flipkart is trusted by more than 500000 sellers online throughout India. By selling online on Flipkart, the sellers also get access to some of India’s largest shopping festivals, such as The Big Billion Days, The Big Diwali Sale, and whatnot! Flipkart.com provides a very low cost of doing business.

content.faqQuestions: How does selling on Flipkart.com work?
content.faqDescription: Selling on Flipkart is a very easy process. All you have to do is list the products that you wish to sell on Flipkart.com. Once the order is placed, all that is required from your end is that you pack your product and deliver the product or use Fulfillment by Flipkart (FBF) and let Flipkart deliver the product for you. Once the product is dispatched, you will receive your payment within 7-10 days* from the date of dispatch.

content.faqQuestions: What is the minimum listing quantity to sell on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: To sell online on Flipkart.com, all you require is at least 1 product to be listed. However, we recommend you to go for more than 1 product as Flipkart encompasses over 50 crore customers across 27000+ pin codes and the trust of 500000 sellers.

content.faqQuestions: What products can I sell on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription: Flipkart.com has more than 3000+ categories that you can opt from and sell online across 27000+ pin codes of India. Some of the popular categories are Clothes, Sarees, Electronics, Shoes, Jewelry, T-Shirts, Furniture, Art, Books, Watch, Mobiles, Camera, Bed, Groceries, Beauty Products, Plants, Kitchenware, and many more. However, certain categories require prior quality approval from the internal committee before going live.

content.faqQuestions: What do I need to register to sell on Flipkart.com?
content.faqDescription:
For selling product online on Flipkart.com, you require the following details-

  3. Details about your tax registration- GSTIN (compulsory if your listed products are taxable) and PAN (Mandatory for Book Sellers)

faqschema.question: Do you offer protection against fraud?
faqschema.answer: Yes, Flipkart.com provides monetary compensation against the orders where the returned products have been damaged/ missing under Seller Protection Fund (SPF) program.

faqschema.question: Can customers leave feedback and why is customer feedback important?
faqschema.answer: Yes, customers can leave feedback regarding the purchased product. Customer feedback and rating are important factors for becoming a successful online seller on Flipkart.com. The higher the rating, the higher the trust in the seller. It is also noticed that customers tend to buy products from sellers with high ratings and positive feedback. In short, feedback plays an evaluating factor in determining the performance of the seller.

faqschema.question: I am having trouble during registration. Can I get some help?
faqschema.answer: Once you are registered at Flipkart Seller Hub, you can get in touch with the seller support team at sell@flipkart.com. Our seller support executive will assist you in the registration process. You can also refer to the FAQ section for any doubts/queries. We will be happy to assist you in each step.

faqschema.question: Do I need GST to sell on Flipkart?
faqschema.answer:
Sellers can sell products online under 2 categories - ‘Everything + Books’ or ‘Only Books’.
  • For the option ‘Everything + Books’, GSTIN is mandatory
  • For the option 'Only Books', PAN is mandatory

faqschema.question: What is Fulfillment by Flipkart (FBF)?
faqschema.answer: Fulfillment By Flipkart is an exclusive program run by Flipkart.com.  Under FBF, your products will be stored at Flipkart’s warehouse from where we will pack and deliver your products to the customers upon order confirmation. Apart from this, FBF will also provide customer service and handle returns.

faqschema.question: How does FBF work?
faqschema.answer:
• Once you are nominated by Flipkart, you are required to register on Flipkart’s warehouses or Fulfillment Centers as an additional place of your business with the tax authorities
  • Next, you are required to send your products to the Flipkart warehouse through Flipkart consignment in advance which is required to be fulfilled by packing and labeling them and shipping your package to us
  • Upon receiving, we will store your products in Flipkart’s Fulfillment Centers.
  • Once the order is received and confirmed, we will ship your products directly from Flipkart’s Fulfillment Centers to the customers
  • In case of any returns, Flipkart.com will take care of it and in case of any damage or wrong products received in return, Flipkart will settle auto SPF against these orders

faqschema.question: What are the benefits of FBF?
faqschema.answer:
By procuring your products/orders through Flipkart’s Fulfillment Centers, you are entitled to the following benefits-
  • Quality Assurance- You can now delight your customers with Flipkart’s trusted quality and assurance
  • Technologically Advancement- Take advantage of Flipkart’s Fulfillment technology to enhance your business
  • No New Investment- Get rid of your worries about renting/buying a new property for storing your products and taking care of them. Flipkart will do it for you
  • No Seller Service Metrics impact: There will not be any RTD Breaches, Pickup Reattempt, and Seller cancellations as the procurement will be managed by the Flipkart Fulfillment center
  • Higher procurement speed: Products will be delivered to the customers at a higher rate as the packing will be managed by the Fulfillment center and will be delivered to the customers. There is no requirement for you to wait for the order to move to the pending label tab, generate the label and mark RTD, handover the shipment as per the scheduled date)

faqschema.question: Do I need a minimum number of items to avail of FBF?
faqschema.answer: No, there is no need to have a minimum number of items to avail FBF. You can avail FBF with one item to the ‘n’ number of items from any category.
